item.title: Anger of stick 5
item.description: Introduction A game by COWON and BUTTON E&M,this game is about a lone stickman(Player) in a zombie infested world fighting off enemies including zombies and people who supports them while saving innocent citizen from hands of the enemies. Available on playstore free to download. It is a mid violence games rated for 7+. The game has a download of 1000,000,000+ downloads. Note to Readers The review is completely based on personal experience and the gameplay and features may change in some devices.
